p: The presenting symptoms of the 50 patients with suspected dengue are shown in Table 2. Other than fever, the most common symptoms were muscle and joint aches (62%), vomiting (52%), nausea (46%), and rashes (46%). Based on these symptoms, 32 (64%), 16 (32%), and 2 (4%) patients were classified as having dengue without warning signs, dengue with warning signs, and severe dengue, respectively.
